body_html:
Using the container there's an additional message, which doesn't appear otherwise:

I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1093] Ignoring visible gpu device (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 750M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 3.0) with Cuda compute capability 3.0. The minimum required Cuda capability is 3.5.

I've tried recompiling from source with Cuda capability 3.0, and still get the same problem.
body_text:

I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1093] Ignoring visible gpu device (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 750M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 3.0) with Cuda compute capability 3.0. The minimum required Cuda capability is 3.5.
I've tried recompiling from source with Cuda capability 3.0, and still get the same problem.
body:
Using the container there's an additional message, which doesn't appear otherwise:

`I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1093] Ignoring visible gpu device (device: 0, name: GeForce GT 750M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 3.0) with Cuda compute capability 3.0. The minimum required Cuda capability is 3.5.`

I've tried recompiling from source with Cuda capability 3.0, and still get the same problem.
